column4: I have ubuntu live and am trying to copy some photo files from a windows drive (borked by malware) to an old linux hd but I keep running into permission problems. Can someone help?
did you sudo mount the drive?
thevdi I can see the files, and I have cleaned off my old user partition, but don't know how to get files to the old partition
no I didn't mount the drive, it just showed up on booting up ubuntu live
